items.title: More investors want public and private assets in their portfolio. Now there's a benchmark to track this combo
items.description: Morningstar announced the Modern Market 100, the first framework to combine public and private equity exposure in one index.

items.title: IPO index hits 3-year high with Klarna latest offering set to boom. Why is market so hot and can it continue?
items.description: Klarna is just the latest IPO to hit the market.

items.title: Three major investment banks crank up their stock market forecasts, citing AI trade, muted tariff impact
items.description: The firms' year-end S&P 500 outlooks now range from 6,450 to 7,000.

items.title: 'Increased confidence in growth': What analysts had to say about Apple's iPhone 17 lineup release
items.description: Analysts are optimistic Apple can become a stronger growth story, even though many hoped that it would increase iPhone prices more significantly.

items.title: Stunned analysts ratchet up targets on Oracle, Bank of America upgrades. Full Wall Street reaction
items.description: Several are cementing the stock as an artificial intelligence frontrunner alongside the market's biggest tech giants.
